botMessages.no-messages: Hi! We don’t have any messages yet. Tell me your goals, and I’ll help you reach them.
botMessages.outOfMessages: You’ve used all your messages. Subscribe to keep using the app.

robot.text: Let’s create your first plan with Dark AI!
robot.title: No Chats Yet

deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? You can’t undo this.
deleteConfirmation.title: Confirm Delete

step1.description: Meet your smart AI helper, here to help you plan and win with a fun twist!
step1.title: Welcome to Dark AI

step2.description: Talk to your Dark Advisor for smart tips on any goal. What’s your next step?
step2.title: Start Planning

step3.description: Your advisor will send fun reminders to keep your plans on track, even when you’re away.
step3.title: Stay on Track

step4.description: Start with free messages, then get unlimited smart tips with a subscription. Ready?
step4.title: Go Unlimited

deleteAccount.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? You can’t undo this.
deleteAccount.title: Delete Account

robot.text: Sign in to use your plans on all your devices with Dark AI.
robot.title: Welcome!

signin.subtitle: Sign in with your Apple ID to use AI features.
signin.title: Sign In
